welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ravenna, where the charm of small-town America meets historic landmarks and beautiful beaches. Get ready to immerse yourself in our city's rich culture and traditions, and enjoy every moment of your stay here!"

restaurants.name: Guido's
restaurants.description: Guido's is a pizzeria located in Ravenna.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves airlines such as Southwest, Spirit, and Frontier.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Youngstown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Youngstown Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
